article_title: Florida chief insurance regulator Kevin McCarty resigns
article_text:
Gov. Rick Scott tried to force McCarty out a year ago

The date of his departure is May 2

McCarty held the top regulatory job for more than a decade, including hurricane-intensive years of 2004-06

article_metadata.news-keywords: Florida Insurance Commissioner, Kevin McCarty, Gov. Rick Scott, resign, insurance regulation, hurricanes
article_metadata.description: After more than a decade as Florida’s chief insurance regulator, Kevin McCarty resigned Tuesday, nearly a year after he overcame a failed effort by Gov. Rick Scott to get rid of him.
article_metadata.title: Florida chief insurance regulator Kevin McCarty resigns | Miami Herald
